Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Ice Arrows# and #a Zora Scale#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
